```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r load-packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
library(leaps)
library(MASS)
```

```{r load-data}
mydata <- read_csv("covid.csv")
```

```{r colnames}
colnames(mydata)
```

```{r nas}
sum(mydata$covid_death_rate_log == '-Inf')
```

```{r remove no case counties}
mydata <- mydata%>%
  filter(covid_death_rate_log != '-Inf')%>%
  mutate(GQ_ESTIMATES_2019 = GQ_ESTIMATES_2019/total_population)%>%
  mutate(density = total_population/area_sqmi)
```

```{r lm}
lm1 <- lm(covid_death_rate_log ~ . - X1 - FIPS - name - state - netMigrationRate - total_population - case_count - death_count - covid_death_rate, data = mydata)
summary(lm1)
```

```{r stepwise}
step.1 <- stepAIC(lm1, direction = "both", trace = FALSE)
summary(step.1)
```

```{r poly}
poly1 <-lm(covid_death_rate_log~poly(GQ_ESTIMATES_2019, 1), data = mydata)
poly2 <-lm(covid_death_rate_log~poly(GQ_ESTIMATES_2019, 2), data = mydata)
poly3 <-lm(covid_death_rate_log~poly(GQ_ESTIMATES_2019, 3), data = mydata)
poly4 <-lm(covid_death_rate_log~poly(GQ_ESTIMATES_2019, 4), data = mydata)
poly5 <-lm(covid_death_rate_log~poly(GQ_ESTIMATES_2019, 5), data = mydata)
anova(poly1, poly2, poly3, poly4, poly5)
```

```{r lm}
lm2 <- lm(covid_death_rate_log ~ GQ_ESTIMATES_2019 + birthRate + poly(deathRate, 3) + domMigrationRate + poly(proTrump, 2) + poly(lon, 2) + lat + poly(per_capita_income, 3) + percent_below_poverty + poly(percent_minorities, 2) + percentile_rank_social_vulnerability + poly(percent_uninsured, 3) + poly(percent_smokers, 2) + percent_fair_or_poor_health + region + govParty + metro_area + main_econ, data = mydata)
summary(lm2)
```

```{r stepwise}
step.2 <- stepAIC(lm2, direction = "both", trace = FALSE)
summary(step.2)
```

```{r plot}
plot(step.2, which = 1:4)
```

```{r modelCV, warning=FALSE}

#creating a training set
smp_size <- floor(0.8 * nrow(mydata))

## set the seed to make partition reproducible
set.seed(123)
train_ind <- sample(seq_len(nrow(mydata)), size = smp_size)

train <- mydata[train_ind, ]
test <- mydata[-train_ind, ]
```

```{r predict}
#obtaining the mean-squared error associated with the stepwise model
pred <- predict(step.2, test)
MSE.2 <- sum((pred - test$covid_death_rate_log)^2)/nrow(test)
MSE.2
```

```{r diagnostics}
#residual diagnostic plots for week 30
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(step.2)
```

```{r }
plot(fitted(step.2),residuals(step.2))
```

```{r predict}
plot( mydata$GQ_ESTIMATES_2019, mydata$covid_death_rate_log, col = "darkgrey")
title("Degree-3 Polynomial", outer = TRUE)
lines(CDRL.grid, preds$fit, lwd = 2, col = "blue")
matlines(CDRL.grid, se.bands, lwd = 1, col = "blue", lty = 3)
```
